caption.p: The natural product piperine ( 1) is the inspiration for this work; the crystal structure is shown [ 14]. In this work, a hypothetical analog 2 was designed to mimic parent compound 1. The predicted low-energy rotamers of 2 about the F–C–C–F and F–C–C=O bonds are shown; rotamers I and IV give the best mimicry of 1.
